comment: Antifa harassed and attacked random motorists in Portland, OR last weekend. Watch them scream at this guy and call him a "white supremacist" for having a North Carolina license plate
amr:
# ::snt Antifa harassed and attacked random motorists in Portland, OR last weekend. Watch them scream at this guy and call him a "white supremacist" for having a North Carolina license plate
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / harass-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Antifa"))
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (r / random)
                        :ARG0-of (d / drive-01))
                  :location (c / city
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Portland")
                        :location (s / state
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "OR")))
                  :time (w / weekend
                        :mod (l / last)))
            :op2 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 o
                  :ARG1 p))
      :snt2 (w2 / watch-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s2 / scream-01
                        :ARG0 (t / they)
                        :ARG2 (g / guy
                              :mod (t2 / this)))
                  :op2 (c2 / call-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG1 g
                        :ARG2 (s3 / supremacist
                              :ARG1-of (w3 / white-02))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (h2 / have-03
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / plate
                                          :mod (l2 / license)
                                          :mod (s4 / state
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "North"
                                                      :op2 "Carolina")))))))))

comment: Just because someone likes the same sex, doesn't mean they deserve to be made fun of.
